name: URL Tail to Clipboard
description:
1. Automatically appends the current page URL as a clickable link to the end of copied content when you copy from a webpage.
2. Includes a shortcut (Ctrl+Alt+C) to append the URL to the page and copy the full HTML source.
3. Also provides options to control this behavior and whitelist domains.
4. A global variable (window.purl) holding the source URL of the tab will be added to each page openning in the browser when a copy action is made, and this is only for developing usage.
